    A

    APERTURE - Enum constant in enum class src.tddgame.CellComponents
     

    C

    Cell - Class in src.tddgame
    This class represents a single square or "cell" in the game grid Each cell has four sides: left, right, up, and down Each side can be a wall, an aperture, or something else defined in CellComponents
    Cell(CellComponents, CellComponents, CellComponents, CellComponents) - Constructor for class src.tddgame.Cell
    Creates a new cell with components on all four sides.
    CellComponents - Enum Class in src.tddgame
    Enum representing the different components a cell can have can be a WALL, APERTURE, or EXIT
    createRandomGrid(int) - Method in class src.tddgame.Game
    Generates a random grid with a path from the bottom-right to the top-left.

    G

    Game - Class in src.tddgame
    The Game class handles core game logic and manages the grid.
    Game(int) - Constructor for class src.tddgame.Game
    Constructs a game with a randomly generated grid of the given size.
    Game(Grid) - Constructor for class src.tddgame.Game
    Constructs a game using an existing grid.
    getCells() - Method in class src.tddgame.Row
    Returns the list of cells in this row.
    getCurrentCell() - Method in class src.tddgame.Player
    Gets the current cell the player is in.
    getCurrentRow() - Method in class src.tddgame.Player
    Gets the current row the player is in.
    getDown() - Method in class src.tddgame.Cell
    Returns whatever is on the bottom side of the cell.
    getGrid() - Method in class src.tddgame.Game
    Returns the current grid.
    getLeft() - Method in class src.tddgame.Cell
    Returns whatever is on the left side of the cell.
    getRight() - Method in class src.tddgame.Cell

    getRows() - Method in class src.tddgame.Grid
    Returns the list of rows in the grid.
    getUp() - Method in class src.tddgame.Cell
    Returns whatever is on the top side of the cell.
    Grid - Class in src.tddgame
    The Grid class represents the full game grid, which is made up of a list of rows.
    Grid(List<Row>) - Constructor for class src.tddgame.Grid
    Creates a new Grid using the provided list of rows.
